main_definition: To be asked or requested to attend an event, gathering, or meeting with the intention of participation.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Having been formally requested by another person to attend a social event.
meanings_and_examples.example: John was invited to his cousin's wedding on June 1st.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To extend an invitation, typically in writing or verbally.
meanings_and_examples.example: She sent out the party invitations last week.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Being included or made a part of something due to being invited.
meanings_and_examples.example: After receiving several invites from her friends, she felt welcomed in their social circle.
